h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Tiger Vanguard
content: Using the Keeness of Tiger and Sterness of Stone, head up the steps to the large headless statue in the middle of the temple’s blood-soaked plaza. By activating this two-headed tally, you’ll drain the bloody pool, and reveal a large lion mouth that serves as a pit into the cellar below.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crouching_Tiger_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Crouching Tiger Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Tiger Vanguard'.
The content is as follows:
Using the Keeness of Tiger and Sterness of Stone, head up the steps to the large headless statue in the middle of the temple’s blood-soaked plaza. By activating this two-headed tally, you’ll drain the bloody pool, and reveal a large lion mouth that serves as a pit into the cellar below.
